alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 03 at 10:25AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Icing is Diminishing Across the Area... .Freezing rain is diminishing across the area, with temperatures rising above freezing over southern parts of the area while over far northwest Iowa the precipitation will transition to snow. The next round of light to moderate snow is expected later this afternoon and into Wednesday. ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain ending later this morning as temperatures rise above freezing. * WHERE...Portions of north central Iowa. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Icy conditions on walkways and roads.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.
